full_screen.name: Plein écran
full_screen.desc: Bascule entre les modes plein écran et fenêtré.

use_shadow_mapping.name: Carte des ombres
use_shadow_mapping.desc: Si vous voulez avoir des ombres de meilleure qualité, activez ceci. Davantage de ressources seront utilisées, mais l'affichage sera plus joli.

poor_man.name: Homme pauvre
poor_man.desc: Cochez cette option pour les systèmes les plus lents.

no_adjust_shadows.name: Ne pas ajuster les ombres
no_adjust_shadows.desc: Si option activée, le moteur ne désactivera pas les ombres si les performances chutent.

clouds_shadows.name: Ombres des nuages
clouds_shadows.desc: L'ombre des nuages sera projetée sur le sol, et le jeu paraitra plus joli.

show_fps.name: Afficher les FPS
show_fps.desc: Affiche dans un coin de l'écran le nombre d'image par seconde.

use_mipmaps.name: Mipmaps
use_mipmaps.desc: Mipmaps est un effet qui estompe un petit peu les textures - cela peut rendre l'affichage plus ou moins beau selon les réglages de votre pilote graphique entre autre.

use_point_particles.name: Point Particles
use_point_particles.desc: Some systems will not support the new point based particles in EL. Disable this if your client complains about not having the point based particles extension.

particles_percentage.name: Pourcentage de particules
particles_percentage.desc: Si les performances baissent quand des particules sont proches, vous devriez songer à baisser ce nombre.

use_vertex_array.name: Tableau de vertex
use_vertex_array.desc: Active l'utilisation des tableaux de vertex.

use_vertex_buffers.name: Vertex buffer objects
use_vertex_buffers.desc: Active l'utilisation des vertex buffer objects.

mouse_limit.name: Sensibilité de la souris
mouse_limit.desc: Vous pouvez augmenter la sensibilité de la souris en baissant ce nombre, mais les performances baissent également !

normal_camera_rotation_speed.name: Vitesse de rotation de la caméra
normal_camera_rotation_speed.desc: Définie la vitesse de rotation de la caméra.

fine_camera_rotation_speed.name: Vitesse de la rotation précise de la caméra
fine_camera_rotation_speed.desc: Définie la vitesse de la rotation précise de la caméra (quand vous utilisez Shift + flèches de direction).

name_text_size.name: Taille du texte des noms
name_text_size.desc: Définie du texte des noms des joueurs.

chat_text_size.name: Taille du texte des discussions
chat_text_size.desc: Définie la taille du texte normal.

name_font.name: Police des noms
name_font.desc: Définie le type de police utilisée pour les noms.

chat_font.name: Police des discussions
chat_font.desc: Définie le type de police utilisée pour le texte normal.

sound_gain.name: Volume des effets sonores
sound_gain.desc: Ajuste le volume des effets sonores.

music_gain.name: Volume de la musique
music_gain.desc: Ajuste le volume de la musique.

sit_lock.name: Posisition assise verrouillée
sit_lock.desc: Empêche votre personnage de bouger par accident quand vous êtes assis.

item_window_on_drop.name: Fenêtre des éléments lors de l'abandon d'objets
item_window_on_drop.desc: Affiche la fenêtre des éléments abandonnées lorsque que vous déposez des objets sur le sol.

relocate_quickbar.name: Relocate Quickbar
relocate_quickbar.desc: Set whether you can move the quickbar

compass_north.name: Compass Direction
compass_north.desc: Set the compass direction for a static compass

auto_afk_time.name: AFK Time
auto_afk_time.desc: The idle time in minutes before the AFK auto message

afk_local.name: Save Local Chat Messages When AFK
afk_local.desc: When you go AFK, local chat messages are counted and saved as well as PMs

use_global_ignores.name: Global Ignores
use_global_ignores.desc: Global ignores is a list with people that are well known for being nasty, so we put them into a list (global_ignores.txt). Enable this to load that list on startup.

save_ignores.name: Save Ignores
save_ignores.desc: Toggle saving of the local ignores list on exit.

use_global_filters.name: Global Filter
use_global_filters.desc: Toggle the use of global text filters.

server_address.name: Server Address
server_address.desc: The address of the EL server

server_port.name: Server Port
server_port.desc: Where on the server to connect.

log_chat.name: Log Messages
log_chat.desc: Log messages from the server (chat, harvesting events, GMs, etc)

language.name: Language
language.desc: Set the language for interface and game manual (need restart): en (english), pl (polski), pt (portugues), es (español), de (deutsche), fr (française), nl (nederlandse), tr (türkçe), hu (magyar).

browser.name: Browser
browser.desc: Location of your web browser (Windows users leave blank to use default browser)

windowed_chat.name: Use Windowed Chat
windowed_chat.desc: How do you want your chat to be displayed?

ati_click_workaround.name: ATI Bug
ati_click_workaround.desc: If you are using an ATI card and don't move when you click, try this option to work around a bug in their drivers

use_alpha_border.name: Alpha Border
use_alpha_border.desc: Toggle the use of alpha borders

use_alpha_banner.name: Alpha Behind Name/Health Text
use_alpha_banner.desc: Toggle the use of an alpha background to name/health banners

use_floating_messages.name: Floating Messages
use_floating_messages.desc: Toggles the use of floating experience messages and other graphical enhancements

server_chat_separate.name: Separate Server Messages
server_chat_separate.desc: Should the messages from the server be separate?

mod_chat_separate.name: Separate Moderator Chat
mod_chat_separate.desc: Should moderator chat be separated from the rest?

highlight_tab_on_nick.name: Highlight Tabs On Name
highlight_tab_on_nick.desc: Should tabs be highlighted when someone mentions your name?

isometric.name: Use Isometric View
isometric.desc: Toggle the use of isometric (instead of perspective) view

perspective.name: Perspective
perspective.desc: The degree of perspective distortion. Change if your view looks odd.

near_plane.name: Near Plane Distance
near_plane.desc: The distance of the near clipping plane to your actor

buddy_log_notice.name: Log Buddy Sign On/Off
buddy_log_notice.desc: Toggle whether to display notices when people on your buddy list log on or off

data_dir.name: Data Directory
data_dir.desc: Place where we keep our data. Can only be changed with a Client restart.

video_mode.name: Video Mode
video_mode.desc: The video mode you wish to use

limit_fps.name: Limit FPS
limit_fps.desc: Limit the frame rate to reduce load on the system

gamma.name: Gamma
gamma.desc: How bright your display should be.

shadow_map_size.name: Shadow Map Size
shadow_map_size.desc: This parameter determines the quality of the shadow maps. You should as minimum set it to 512.

use_old_clicker.name: Mouse Bug
use_old_clicker.desc: If the above option doesn't move you when you click, try this one

use_frame_buffer.name: Toggle Frame Buffer Support
use_frame_buffer.desc: Toggle frame buffer support. At the moment frame buffer is only used for reflections.

use_clipboard.name: Use Clipboard For Pasting
use_clipboard.desc: Use CLIPBOARD for pasting (as e.g. GNOME does) or use PRIMARY cutbuffer (as xterm does)

use_compiled_vertex_array.name: Compiled Vertex Array
use_compiled_vertex_array.desc: Some systems will not support the new compiled vertex array in EL. Disable this if some 3D objects do not display correctly.

show_statbars_in_hud.name: StatBars In HUD
show_statbars_in_hud.desc: Toggle showing statbars in the HUD. Needs Stats in HUD

autoupdate.name: Automatic Updates
autoupdate.desc: Toggles whether updates are automatically downloaded.

windows_on_top.name: Windows On Top
windows_on_top.desc: Allows the Manufacture, Storage and Inventory windows to appear above the map and console.

use_eye_candy.name: Enable Eye Candy
use_eye_candy.desc: Toggles most visual effects, like spells' and harvesting events'
